title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Video Club-Based Collaborative Approaches for Enhancing Clinical Educator Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can identify strengths and areas for improvement in teaching strategies through clinical lesson video analysis with over 85% accuracy
Participants can create personalized teaching method improvement plans through peer feedback and reflective discussions
Participants can develop at least one practical clinical teaching scenario applicable in real-world settings through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
